entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
